overview:
Business student at Universidad Andr√©s Bello.

In late 2009 Co-founded the first company loyalty of customers to the business of entertainment at night, Listas-Santiago SA, taking less than 2 months of 3000 university students, aged 18 to 24 years, enrolled in their website.

With a new vision of the first project lists Santiago SA, decided with his brother and two partners to create a “Nixter” which also focuses on the loyalty of customers for the night but heading worldwide. Nixter has already raised over U$130k in 3 months. At this moment, Joaquin continues working in nixter, which together with his partners hope to raise a capital of $ 750k, for then go to internationalize their business.
